item.title: Risk Technology Awards 2022
item.description: The 2022 Risk Technology Awards recognised products and services that helped firms steer through the Covid-19 pandemic, a testament to the winners’ resilience in the face of unprecedented disruption and the key role they play in today’s markets. This year’s awards include 24 award categories, in credit risk, operational risk, enterprise risk management (ERM) and regulatory risk.

item.title: Risk Technology Awards 2022: No oil painting
item.description: After years of relative peace, the risk landscape has turned ugly. This year’s winners of the Risk Technology Awards weigh the challenges facing their clients

item.title: Markets Technology Awards 2022 winner's interview: swissQuant
item.description: Joe Kenel, capital markets technologies at swissQuant, discusses the technology solutions provider's Central counterparty clearing support product of the year win at the Markets Technology Awards

item.title: ION Commodities: spotlight on risk management trends
item.description: Sunil Biswas, chief product officer at ION Commodities, discusses his firm’s achievements and the trends he believes will most affect commodity risk management.

item.title: NIT protocol expanded among plans to electronify the full bond lifecycle
item.description: In this podcast, Zoi Fletcher speaks to Johnny Gray, Liquidnet Primary Markets, about the benefits of this expansion to the buy and sell sides.

item.title: How energy risk managers are responding to extreme volatility
item.description: Changing energy market dynamics pose higher risks but also huge opportunities for risk managers that move swiftly, says Lacima’s Chris Strickland

item.title: QIS offering and defensive strategies on the Raven indexes
Comprehensive technology overhaul for the world’s largest equity derivatives clearing house
item.description: In this podcast, Zoi Fletcher speaks to Scot Warren, chief operating officer at OCC about the advances brought about by its technology overhaul

item.title: KWA Analytics spearheads CTRM modernisation drive
item.description: KWA’s continued expansion into next-generation technology reaps rewards for clients and has helped the firm dominate in the 2022 Energy Risk Software Rankings

item.title: Risk Awards 2022 winner's interview: TP ICAP
item.description: Zoi Fletcher talks to Don McClumpha, chief executive of global broking for Europe, the Middle East and Africa at TP ICAP, about the firm’s win in the OTC trading platform of the year category in the Risk Awards 2022

item.title: Varying responses from defined benefit pension schemes as TCFD requirements come into force
item.description: Zoi Fletcher speaks to Simon Robinson, director of product management at Moody’s Analytics, about how the industry and DB pension schemes are responding to the TCFD recommendations

item.title: The evolution of Intesa Sanpaolo’s credit portfolio management practice
item.description: In this podcast, Zoi Fletcher speaks to Elisabetta Bernardini and Biagio Giacalone about the new approaches Intesa Sanpaolo has developed to credit portfolio management.

item.title: Machine learning models: the new standard in capital markets
item.description: Zoi Fletcher speaks to Alexander Sokol, founder and executive chairman at CompatibL, about why he believes machine learning technology will be used to calculate risk measures across the industry going forward

item.title: Sentiment analytics enhances performance of equity factor investing strategies

item.description: Risk Awards 2022: EC debt programme skyrockets to fund recovery package of up to €800 billion

item.title: Markets Technology Awards 2022 winners' review
item.description: The Markets Technology Awards were as fiercely contested as ever this year, a testament to the volume, strength and variety of technology firms playing a key role in today’s markets

item.title: Energy Risk Asia Awards 2021
item.description: The Energy Risk Asia Awards 2021 recognise firms that are demonstrating best practice in risk management across the commodities complex. The winning firms are helping to drive the discipline to the next level through a mixture of innovation, determination and prudence
